name: @tellerlin/claude-code-rock
description: Use Claude Code without an Anthropics account and route it to another LLM provider

scripts.build: esbuild src/cli.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/cli.js --external:node-fetch && esbuild scripts/cco-test.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=scripts/cco-test.js --external:node-fetch && shx cp node_modules/tiktoken/tiktoken_bg.wasm dist/tiktoken_bg.wasm
scripts.publish:all: npm run release && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish --access public

author: musistudio
